title: In desperate need of identifying script "C" used for a baseball team
content:
I’m in desperate need of identifying the font... it’s used for a baseball team and their orginal artwork and specs were burned recently in a fire and they have no clue or vector of it etc.

THANKS!!

author: vmh1976

comments.content: Bit tough with just a ’C’, is there anything else to go on?

Hey Nick

sorry that’s all I have....
